column1: Paredes (Portuguese pronunciation: [pɐˈɾeðɨʃ] (listen)) is a city and a municipality in Porto District
column2: in northern Portugal. The population in 2011 was 86
column5: Paredes Municipality contains four cities: Paredes
column7: São Salvador de Lordelo and Gandra
column8: being the Portuguese municipality with the most cities.

column1: Paredes has a total of 18 parishes. The municipality is bordered on the north by the municipality of Paços de Ferreira
column2: to the east by Lousada and Penafiel
column3: to the southwest by Gondomar and to the west by Valongo. The municipality was created in 1836.
